fullGameBoost: refresh_rate=144; echo '█▓▒▒░░░ Starting Full System & Game Boost ░░░▒▒▓█'; echo 'Target Game: {packageName}'; sleep 1; echo '--- 1. Closing Background Apps ---'; am kill-all; echo '[✔] Non-essential processes terminated.'; echo '--- 2. CPU & Job Scheduler Optimizations ---'; cmd jobscheduler monitor-battery off; cmd jobscheduler cache-config-changes off; cmd jobscheduler enable-flex-policy --option idle --option charging; echo '[✔] CPU tasks optimized.'; echo '--- 3. FPS & Refresh Rate Tweaks (SurfaceFlinger) ---'; setprop debug.sf.frame_rate_multiple_threshold $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sf.log_expensive_rendering true; setprop debug.sf.scroll_boost_refreshrate $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sf.touch_boost_refreshrate $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sf.high_speed_scroll_factor 25; setprop debug.sf.enable_refresh_rate_restriction_for_app_switch 1; echo '[✔] SurfaceFlinger tuned.'; echo '--- 4. Power and Refresh Rate Settings (Comprehensive) ---'; cmd power set-mode 0; settings put global low_power 0; cmd device_config put system display_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; settings put secure user_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; settings put secure miui_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; settings put system min_frame_rate $refresh_rate; settings put system max_frame_rate $refresh_rate; settings put system peak_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; settings put global min_fps $refresh_rate; settings put global max_fps $refresh_rate; settings put system display_min_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; settings put system min_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; settings put system max_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; settings put system thermal_limit_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; cmd display set-match-content-frame-rate-pref 1; settings put system power.dfps.level 0; settings put system disable_idle_fps true; settings put system display.disable_dynamic_fps 1; settings put system display.refresh_rate_changeable 0; settings put system display.disable_mitigated_fps 1; settings put global dfps.enable false; settings put global smart_dfps.enable false; settings put global fps.switch.thermal false; setprop debug.mediatek_high_frame_rate_sf_set_big_core_fps_threshold $refresh_rate; settings put global tran_low_battery_60hz_refresh_rate.support 0; echo '[✔] Power settings maximized and refresh rate locked.'; echo '--- 5. Stable FPS Optimizations (Debug) ---'; setprop debug.sys.display.fps $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sys.display_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sys.game.minfps $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sys.game.maxfps $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sys.game.minframerate $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sys.game.maxframerate $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sys.min_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sys.max_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sys.peak_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sys.sf.fps $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sys.smartfps 1; setprop debug.sys.vsync_optimization_enable false; setprop debug.sys.hwui.dyn_vsync 0; setprop debug.sys.vsync false; setprop debug.sys.hwui.fps_mode 1; setprop debug.sys.first.frame.accelerates true; setprop debug.sys.fps_unlock_allowed $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sys.display.max_fps $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sys.video.max.fps $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sys.surfaceflinger.idle_reduce_framerate_enable false; echo '[✔] Debug FPS properties applied.'; echo '--- 6. Stable FPS Optimizations (System) ---'; setprop sys.display.fps $refresh_rate; setprop sys.display_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; setprop sys.game.minfps $refresh_rate; setprop sys.game.maxfps $refresh_rate; setprop sys.game.minframerate $refresh_rate; setprop sys.game.maxframerate $refresh_rate; setprop sys.min_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; setprop sys.max_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; setprop sys.peak_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; setprop sys.sf.fps $refresh_rate; setprop sys.smartfps 1; setprop sys.vsync_optimization_enable false; setprop sys.hwui.dyn_vsync 0; setprop sys.vsync false; setprop sys.hwui.fps_mode 1; setprop sys.first.frame.accelerates true; setprop sys.fps_unlock_allowed $refresh_rate; setprop sys.display.max_fps $refresh_rate; setprop sys.video.max.fps $refresh_rate; setprop sys.surfaceflinger.idle_reduce_framerate_enable false; echo '[✔] System FPS properties applied.'; echo '--- 7. Optimize Refresh Rate & Game Driver ---'; settings put global surface_flinger.use_content_detection_for_refresh_rate false; settings put global media.recorder-max-base-layer-fps $refresh_rate; setprop debug.hwui.refresh_rate $refresh_rate; setprop debug.sf.set_idle_timer_ms 500; setprop debug.sf.latch_unsignaled 1; settings put system game_driver_min_frame_rate $refresh_rate; settings put system game_driver_max_frame_rate $refresh_rate; settings put system game_driver_power_saving_mode 0; settings put system game_driver_frame_skip_enable 0; settings put system game_driver_vsync_enable 0; settings put system game_driver_gpu_mode 1; settings put system game_driver_fps_limit $refresh_rate; echo '[✔] Refresh rate and Game Driver optimized.'; echo '--- 8. FPS Injector & GPU Tweaks ---'; setprop debug.graphics.game_default_frame_rate $refresh_rate; setprop debug.graphics.game_default_frame_rate.disabled false; setprop persist.sys.gpu_perf_mode 1; setprop debug.mtk.powerhal.hint.bypass 1; setprop persist.sys.surfaceflinger.idle_reduce_framerate_enable false; setprop debug.sf.perf_mode 1; settings put global refresh.active 1; setprop debug.hwui.disable_vsync true; setprop debug.performance.profile 1; setprop debug.perf.tuning 1; echo '[✔] FPS injector and GPU tweaks activated.'; echo '--- 9. FPS Lock Tweaks ---'; settings put system fps_limit $refresh_rate; settings put system max_refresh_rate_for_ui $refresh_rate; settings put system hwui_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; settings put system max_refresh_rate_for_gaming $refresh_rate; setprop persist.vendor.display.refresh_rate $refresh_rate; echo '[✔] Final FPS lock tweaks applied.'; echo '--- 10. Optimizing Target Game: {packageName} ---'; dumpsys deviceidle whitelist +{packageName}; am force-stop {packageName}; echo '[✔] Game-specific optimizations applied.'; echo '--- 11. Flushing Caches (Extended RAM) ---'; sync; echo 3 > /proc/sys/vm/drop_caches; dumpsys meminfo --clear-all-caches; rm -rf /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/*/cache/*; echo '[✔] System memory and storage caches flushed.'; echo ''; echo '█▓▒▒░░░ BOOST COMPLETE FOR {packageName} ░░░▒▒▓█'
utilityRamClean: echo '█▓▒▒░░░ CLEANING RAM CACHES ░░░▒▒▓█'; am kill-all; sync; echo 3 > /proc/sys/vm/drop_caches; dumpsys meminfo --clear-all-caches; echo '[✔] RAM cleaning commands executed.'; echo '█▓▒▒░░░ RAM CLEAN COMPLETE ░░░▒▒▓█'
utilityStorageClean: echo '█▓▒▒░░░ CLEANING STORAGE CACHE ░░░▒▒▓█'; rm -rf /data/dalvik-cache/*; rm -rf /cache/*; rm -rf /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/*/cache/*; echo '[✔] Attempted to clear system and app caches.'; echo '█▓▒▒░░░ CACHE CLEAN COMPLETE ░░░▒▒▓█'
